title: Authenticating (After Ranked game Tahm)
body: Hi , I was hoping to find some help. I was playing league of legends perfectly find earlier on 7/28/2017 around 11am  it all happen after a ranked match. I was playing as tahm support and we ended up losing the game but after end game screen couldn't load it so I simply skipped status and then I couldn't click on lobby at all it was grayed out I still could send messages. but I couldn't play after that match I restarted the game and I been sitting at Authenticating for good 3 hours. My wifi is powerful to run 4 league of legends games on 4 laptops at the same time. So that's can't be the problem I have a Dell 7000 so I have the specs to run it? any ideas what could be the cause of it. I did a quick repair and didn't solve anything reset my wifi still nothing any ideas?

replies.body:
It sounds like some specific services are being blocked off.  You can access pvp.net, but failing to reach the authentication server.  To start, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto configure your firewalls in case that might be it.

Otherwise, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up whatever is causing this block.
Did the trick sorry super late reply but thxs again riot
